languages.text: "Ну ты не горюй слишком сильно. Опыт показывает, что тебе еще может предоставиться такая возможность".
"Well, do not fall into despair — experience shows that you may yet get the opportunity."
languages.original_text: "Ну ты не горюй слишком сильно. Опыт показывает, что тебе еще может предоставиться такая возможность".

traits.locale_text: "Well, do not fall into despair — experience shows that you may yet get the opportunity."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, do not fall into despair — experience shows that you may yet get the opportunity."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, do not fall into despair — experience shows that you may yet get the opportunity."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, do not fall into despair — experience shows that you may yet get the opportunity."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “好吧，无论何时都不该绝望，因为说不定还有报仇的机会，这是经验之谈。”
languages.original_text: "Well, do not fall into despair — experience shows that you may yet get the opportunity."

traits.locale_text: “好吧，无论何时都不该绝望，因为说不定还有报仇的机会，这是经验之谈。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Eh bien, ne perdez pas espoir. D'après mon expérience, vous pourriez bien en avoir l'occasion un jour. »
languages.original_text: "Well, do not fall into despair — experience shows that you may yet get the opportunity."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, ne perdez pas espoir. D'après mon expérience, vous pourriez bien en avoir l'occasion un jour. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Bueno, no desesperes... Visto lo visto, es posible que todavía tengas ocasión de hacerlo».
languages.original_text: "Well, do not fall into despair — experience shows that you may yet get the opportunity."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, no desesperes... Visto lo visto, es posible que todavía tengas ocasión de hacerlo».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「おいおい、絶望に沈むなよ――実験してれば機会も得られるさ」
languages.original_text: "Well, do not fall into despair — experience shows that you may yet get the opportunity."

traits.locale_text: 「おいおい、絶望に沈むなよ――実験してれば機会も得られるさ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Nun, verzweifelt nicht — die Erfahrung zeigt, dass Ihr vielleicht noch die Gelegenheit dazu bekommt."
languages.original_text: "Well, do not fall into despair — experience shows that you may yet get the opportunity."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, verzweifelt nicht — die Erfahrung zeigt, dass Ihr vielleicht noch die Gelegenheit dazu bekommt."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Well, do not fall into despair — experience shows that you may yet get the opportunity."

languages.text: "Kendini üzme. Deneyimlerime göre bu şansı tamamen kaybetmiş sayılmazsın."
languages.original_text: "Well, do not fall into despair — experience shows that you may yet get the opportunity."

traits.locale_text: "Kendini üzme. Deneyimlerime göre bu şansı tamamen kaybetmiş sayılmazsın."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
